title: Calories in Wendy's Chili
meta_description: Discover calories in Wendy's chili for a standard small serving, including macros like protein and carbs, plus nutrition tweaks and FAQs for fast food tracking.
assumptions: Small serving (8 oz or 227 g), standard recipe with beef, beans, tomatoes, and spices; no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check Wendy's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One small serving of Wendy's chili has ~170 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a small Wendy's chili?
faqs.a: About 170 kcal per small 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: What is the protein in Wendy's chili?
faqs.a: 15 g protein in one small serving.

faqs.q: Does Wendy's chili have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 860 mg per small servingâ€”watch if on a low-sodium diet.
Approximately 340 kcal for the 12 oz large serving.
19 g carbs per small serving, with 6 g fiber, making it moderate for low-carb plans.
